Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: s ses=%request.Get("sessionid",1) s %session=%session.GetSession(ses) s classmethod=%request.Get("classmethod",1) s id=%request.Get("id",1) s documentclass=%request.Get("documentclass",1) s class=$P(classmethod,".",1,$L(classmethod,".")-1) s method=$P(classmethod,".",$L(classmethod,".")) s xmlobj=%request.Content i $ISOBJECT(xmlobj) d . s ok=$ZOBJCLASSMETHOD(class,method,xmlobj,id,documentclass) w $G(ok,"xmlmethod.csp\nОшибка. Запрос не может быть обработан.")
